premium tier is now generally available. The Service Bus Geo-Replication
feature is one of the options to insulate
Azure Service Bus applications against outages and disasters, providing

items.title: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure Premium SSD v2 Disk is now available in Austria East and in a second Availability Zone in Japan West
items.description: Azure Premium SSD v2 is now available in Austria East and in a second Availability Zone in Japan West.  Azure Premium SSD v2, a next-generation general-purpose block storage solution, offers sub-millisecond latencies and exceptional price performance for

items.title: Retirement: Deprecation of Custom Resource Providers
items.description: In 2026, Azure Resource Manager will be deprecating the Custom Resource Provider (CuRP) service.We will retire the feature by October 31, 2026. We will be performing a scream test on October 27, 2025, as part of this deprecation. On July 31, 2026, creates

items.title: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure Blob-to-Blob migration made simple with Azure Storage Mover

migration feature is now in Public Preview, empowering organizations to move
data between two Blob containers within the same or different storage accounts, subscriptions or Azure regions securel
